nodes.text: Laria was a planet located in the Rseik sector of the Outer Rim Territories.

During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, archaeologists were trying to restore a dozen of star-charts that were discovered in the databases of the old ruins.
Some time after the Bordal Contagion, the spaceport operated by the Trade Federation located here was upgraded.
